name: World War Survival Saga
description:
Become a greatest army soldier hero in this world war survival game. This game will take you to World War II battlefields, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles. Be a real army hero and fight bravely in WW2 battle. You need to eliminate all the terror with your extreme gun shooting and sniper skills. Time to show your great army training school abilities and shoot down all the enemies with your weapon.

World War Survival Game is highly addictive fps shooting game. This game will let you combat like a real sniper shooter in this modern fps world war game. As an expert army shooter eliminate all sort of attack from enemies. Prove that there is no other WW2 army soldier better than you who can fulfill battleground duty.

Features:

Challenging World War Shooting Missions!
Extreme Thrill and Action in Deadly Shooting Missions!
An Epic First Person Shooting Action Game of 2018
Superb 3D Environment, Graphics & Engaging Sound Effects!
Real time world war experience
